response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's worth $10,000 to you. However, considering the cost and effort we've invested into developing this product, I'm offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
